dialogue.text: 「把熄灯器放回斗篷里边的口袋里」

「Mr. Potter, I trust you are aware that the Invisibility Cloak is not to be used for mischief or unauthorized activities. It is a powerful and valuable magical artifact that must be handled with utmost care and respect. I expect you to return it to its proper place and refrain from any further misuse. Is that clear?」
「我从来没有见过一只猫像这样僵硬地待着。」
「那是因为这只猫不是普通的猫，邓布利多先生。这是一只变形猫，也就是我自己。」
「十一年来值得我们庆贺的事太少了。」

dialogue.role: 教授麦格教嗔怒地说道
dialogue.text: “我知道。但这并不是我们失去理智的理由。人们在大白天在街上漫无目的地闲逛，甚至不穿麻瓜的衣服，互相传播谣言。”

dialogue.role: 教授麦格教严肃地说道
dialogue.text: “如果在伏地魔似乎终于消失的那一天，麻瓜们发现我们的存在，那将是一件很糟糕的事情。邓布利多，我想他真的走了吗？”
“柠檬糖。那是一种我非常喜欢的麻瓜糖果。”
“不用了，谢谢。她似乎不觉得现在是吃柠檬糖的时候。正如我所说，即使伏地魔已经离开——但你不同。每个人都知道你是唯一一个伏地魔害怕的人。”
“我提议在晚餐前将三强杯带入迷宫。将其变成了传送门。我的主人的计划成功了。他已经重获力量，我将得到他无法想象的荣耀。”
“当然，”教授麦格教点了点头。
“那么，麦格教授，我恐怕这是你的朋友邓布利多的终结了。”
“你这么认为吗？”
“那么，邓布利多……他真的……？”
“当然，”教授麦格教点了点头。
“那天空气中充满了期待的愉快感。大家上课时都不太专心，更加关注的是贝克巴顿和德拉斯特朗的人今晚的到来；即使是魔药课也比平时容易忍受，因为时间缩短了半个小时。当铃声提前响起时，哈利、罗恩和赫敏匆忙赶到了格兰芬多塔楼，放下书包和书籍，穿上斗篷，然后匆忙回到楼下的入口大厅。”
“韦斯莱，整理一下你的帽子。帕蒂尔小姐，把你头上那个荒谬的东西拿下来。”
“我们去拿我们的东西。”
“你在说什么，韦斯莱？”
“珀西不会想为有幽默感的人工作的，对吧？如果一个笑话赤身裸体地在他面前跳舞，戴着多比的茶壶套，珀西也认不出来。”
“波特！韦斯莱！你们能专心点吗？”
“既然波特和韦斯莱已经很慷慨地表现出他们的年龄，我有些话要对你们所有人说。”
“她用力在肋骨上戳了戳她，脸上愤怒地扭曲着，她也在努力不笑。”
“穿礼服，舞会将于圣诞节当天晚上八点开始，在午夜结束于大厅。现在——但这并不意味着我们会放松对霍格沃茨学生的行为要求。如果一个格兰芬多学生以任何方式让学校难堪，我将非常不悦。波特，冠军们和他们的舞伴——”
「没有回答麦格教授的问题」
「I asked you a question, Mr. Potter. Why didn't you send us a letter by owl?」
「好像是这样，我们应该感到欣慰。您来一块柠檬雪糕好吗?」
「不，谢谢。这并不是吃柠檬雪糕的时候。正如我所说，即使伏地魔已经消失了——但是你们不同。每个人都知道你是唯一一个伏地魔害怕的人。」
「一块柠檬雪糕。这是麻瓜们的一种甜点。我很喜欢。」
「那是你的事情，邓布利多先生。我们有更重要的事情要讨论。」
「我亲爱的教授，像您这样的明白人，总该可以直呼他的大名吧?什么神秘人不神秘人的，全都是瞎扯淡——十一年了，我一直想方设法说服大家，直呼他本人的名字：伏地魔。」
「Albus, please remember that we must exercise caution when speaking of He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. It is not wise to underestimate the power and fear associated with his name.」
「这对他是最合适的地方了。等他长大一些，他的姨妈姨父会向他说明一切。我给他们写了一封信。」
「Very well, Dumbledore. If you believe it is for the best.」
「说得对极了，这足以使任何一个孩子冲昏头脑。不会走路、不会说话的时候就一举成名!甚至为他根本不记得的事情而成名!让他在远离过去的地方成长，直到他能接受这一切，再让他知道，不是更好吗?」
「邓布利多先生，你总是有着深思熟虑的见解。确实，让孩子们在一个安全的环境中成长，直到他们准备好面对过去的一切，这是一个更好的选择。」
「海格会把他带到这里来。」
「Very well, Dumbledore. I shall inform Hagrid to bring him here.」
「我可以把我的身家性命托付给他。」
「Dumbledore, you can't be serious!」
「邓布利多和麦格教授朝那卷毛毯俯下身去。他们看见毛毯里裹着一个男婴，睡得正香。孩子前额上一绺乌黑的头发下边有一处刀伤，伤口形状很奇怪，像一道闪电。」
「Goodness me, is that — is that Harry Potter?」
「It is indeed. The Boy Who Lived.」
「My, my, how he has grown.」
「是的，他一辈子都要带着这道伤疤了。」
「邓布利多先生，你能不能为此做些什么呢？」
「我——我实在受——受不了……莉莉和詹姆死了……可怜的小哈利又要住在麻瓜们家里……」

「Hagrid, I understand your distress, but we must remain focused and composed in this difficult time. Lily and James' sacrifice will not be in vain, and we must ensure Harry's safety and well-being. We will do everything in our power to protect him and defeat the Dark Lord. Now, please gather yourself and join us in my office. We have important matters to discuss.」
「对——对——对不起，我——我实在受——受不了……莉莉和詹姆死了……可怜的小哈利又要住在麻瓜们家里……」

「Hagrid, pull yourself together! What you're saying is highly inappropriate and insensitive. Yes, Lily and James Potter have tragically lost their lives, and Harry is now living with Muggles. But we must focus on ensuring his safety and well-being. It is our duty to protect him and guide him through these difficult times.」
「他一辈子都要带着这道伤疤了。」
「是的，邓布利多先生。他将永远带着这道伤疤。」
「给了哈利一个胡子拉碴、痒乎乎的吻，突然像一只受伤的狗号叫了一声」
「Mr. Potter, I must say, that was quite an unexpected display of affection. However, we have more pressing matters at hand. We need to focus on the task at hand and address the current situation.」
「他们怎么能准确地把我们分到哪所学院去呢?」

「The Sorting Hat takes into account the qualities that each student possesses and places them in the house that best suits their character. It is a magical artifact that has been used for centuries to ensure fairness and balance in the distribution of students. Rest assured, Mr. Potter, the Sorting Hat's decision is not to be questioned.」
「麦格教授回来了。幽灵们鱼贯地飘飘荡荡穿过对面的墙壁不见了。」
「What is the meaning of this?」
「当然，戴帽子要比来一段咒语好多了，但他还是不希望在众目睽睽之下去戴。看来这顶帽子的要求高了些。哈利觉得自己没有那份勇气和机灵劲儿或其他任何优点。如果帽子提出有一所专门让优柔寡断的人进的学院，那倒是对他最合适的地方。」

「Potter, you underestimate yourself. The Sorting Hat takes into account more than just courage and quick thinking. It looks at your potential, your values, and your character. I believe you have qualities that would make you a great asset to any house.」
「一跃而起」
「What is the meaning of this?」
「仿佛看见自己拎着海格的口袋，拖着沉重的脚步在场地里走来走去，眼巴巴地看着罗恩和其他人成为巫师，他一想起这些就觉得胃拧成了一团」
「Mr. Weasley, I understand your concerns, but we must focus on the task at hand.」
「伍德?哈利迷惑不解地想，难道是木头拐杖，她要用它来教训他?【英文里的姓氏“伍德”同时兼有“木头”的意思。】谁知，伍德原来是一个人，一个高大结实的五年级男生，一脸茫然地走出弗立维的教室。」

「Mr. Potter, I see you have encountered Oliver Wood. He is the captain of the Gryffindor Quidditch team and a rather dedicated individual when it comes to the sport. I assure you, he has no intention of using any wooden sticks to discipline you.」
「出去，皮皮鬼!」
「Mr. Peeves, I must insist that you leave immediately and cease causing disruptions. This is a place of learning and respect, not a playground for mischief.」
「你当真吗，教授?」

「Potter, I assure you, the security measures put in place to protect the Sorcerer's Stone are formidable. It is guarded by enchantments and spells that are beyond the capabilities of any ordinary wizard. Rest assured, the Stone is safe.」
「默默地点点头，一点儿也不明白是怎么回事，但看来他不会被开除了，他的双腿又开始慢慢恢复了知觉。」

「Mr. Potter, I must say I am relieved to see that you are recovering. However, it is imperative that you exercise caution and follow the instructions of Madam Pomfrey to ensure a full and proper recovery. We cannot afford any further mishaps or disruptions.」
「他的体型正适合当一个找球手，轻盈——敏捷——我们必须给他弄一个像样的扫帚，教授——我看，就来一把光轮2000或横扫七星吧。」
「伍德是格兰芬多队的队长。他的确适合成为一个找球手。」
「轻盈——敏捷——我们得给他一把像样的扫帚，教授——我建议用光轮2000或横扫七星。」
「我将与邓布利多教授商议，看看我们是否能够打破一年级的规定。老天知道，我们需要比去年更好的球队。上一场比赛被斯莱特林队彻底击败，我几周都无法正视西弗勒斯·斯内普的眼睛...」
「请别这样，麦格教授——他们是在找我。」
「找你？为什么？」
「他们想知道我在哪里，他们想抓住我。」
「抓住你？为什么？你有什么事情要告诉他们吗？」
「不，我没有。但是他们认为我知道一些他们想知道的事情。」
「那么你为什么不去找那些人呢？为什么要来找我？」
「因为我知道你会保护我，麦格教授。」
「你是对的，我会保护你。现在，我们需要制定一个计划，确保你的安全。」
「竭力装出一副早已熟悉这个故事的样子」

「Mr. Potter, I trust you are not attempting to deceive me with your feigned familiarity. Remember, I have been overseeing the Sorting Ceremony for many years, and I can easily discern those who are truly knowledgeable from those who are merely pretending. Now, form a line and follow me, for the Sorting Ceremony is about to commence.」
「撤漩说自己违反了校规」
「Mr. Weasley!」
「I know, I know, it was a very stupid thing to do, I —」
「I expect you will find, Mr. Weasley, that any attack made on a fellow student results in a detention —」
「I don’t care about that, it was worth it.」
「Worth it?」
「To see Umbridge taken down a peg or two.」
「You seem to be laboring under the delusion that I am going to — what are you doing?」
「I’m going to tell them what happened.」
「Sit down!」
「But —」
「Sit down, all of you!」
「离去了。」
「Very well, Miss Granger. I trust you will ensure the safety of your fellow students.」
「跟着海格和他的冷杉树，一起来到礼堂里」
「Mr. Hagrid, I trust you have brought the students safely to the Great Hall. Please ensure they are seated and ready for the Sorting Ceremony.」
「看着海格喝酒，最后在麦格教授的面颊上亲了一口」

「Mr. Hagrid, I must insist that you refrain from such behavior. Kissing a professor on the cheek is highly inappropriate and unprofessional. Please remember to maintain proper decorum within the school premises.」
「他们抬着诺伯走上门厅的大理石台阶，走过漆黑一片的走廊。上了一层楼，又上一层楼。」
「Keep moving, everyone. No dawdling. We need to reach the Great Hall quickly.」
「你没有明白，教授，哈利·波特要来了——他带着一条龙!」

「Mr. Malfoy, I assure you that I am well aware of Mr. Potter's arrival and the presence of a dragon. However, I highly doubt the validity of such a claim. Dragons are highly regulated and prohibited within the grounds of Hogwarts. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have matters to attend to.」
「Mr. Potter, I understand your desire to express gratitude, but now is not the time for gestures. We must focus on the task at hand and ensure the safety of our fellow students.」
「低头盯着自己的拖鞋，一动不动」
「Mr. Weasley, I trust you have a valid reason for not paying attention?」
「（在黑夜里跑出来寻找他们，要给他们提个醒）」

「Mr. Navi, I appreciate your concern, but it is not safe for you to go out alone in the dark. I will ensure that the necessary measures are taken to locate and protect the students. Your assistance is not required at this moment.」
「五十?」
「Fifty points from Gryffindor for your cheek, Mr. Potter.」
「教授——求求您——」
「Potter，我知道你的意图是善良的，但你必须明白，我们必须遵守规则和法律。我不能容忍你冒险行事。你应该尽量保护自己，而不是主动寻求危险。」
「叫他们挨个儿走进教室，看他们能不能使一只凤梨跳着踢踏舞走过一张书桌。」

「Mr. Flitwick, I appreciate your enthusiasm, but this is not the time for pineapple tap-dancing. We are facing a serious threat and must focus on the safety and well-being of our students. Please assist in the evacuation process as instructed.」
「我们只好——」
「不，波特，你们不会去做任何冒险。我会立即通知教务长，我们需要更多的帮助。」
「希望自己没有这么说」

「I understand your reluctance, Harry, but we are facing grave circumstances. It is crucial that we share information and work together to ensure our safety and the defeat of the Dark forces. Trust in your allies, for we are here to support you.」
「他走了?在这个时候?」
「Yes, Potter. He's gone. And it's high time you start focusing on your studies and preparing for your future.」
「可是这件事非常重要。」
「我明白，Potter，这件事的重要性。但你必须明白，我们面临着巨大的风险和挑战。我们需要谨慎行事，不能轻率地冒险。」
「是这样，教授——是关于魔法石的——」
「你怎么知道——？」
「教授，我想——我知道——有人要来偷魔法石。我必须找达姆弗雷教授谈谈。」
「达姆弗雷教授明天就会回来。我不知道你是怎么知道魔法石的事情的，但请放心，没有人能够偷走它，它受到了很好的保护。」
「教授，我认为——我知道——斯内——有人试图去偷魔法石。我必须和邓布利多教授谈谈。」

「Potter, I understand your concern, but I assure you that the safety of the Philosopher's Stone is of utmost importance. Rest assured, it is well protected and the necessary precautions have been taken. However, I appreciate your vigilance and I will inform Professor Dumbledore of your concerns upon his return.」
「可是教授——」

「Potter, I assure you that I am well aware of your concerns. However, I must emphasize the importance of following the curriculum and putting in the necessary effort. If you have any specific questions or difficulties, I am more than willing to assist you. But remember, success in Transfiguration, or any subject for that matter, requires dedication and perseverance.」
「我们俩最好待在四楼的走廊外面。走吧。」
「我想你们认为自己比一群魔法咒语更难对付！够了，别再胡闹了！如果我听说你们再靠近这里，我会再从格兰芬多扣除五十分！是的，韦斯莱，来自我自己的学院！」
「我们没有别的办法，老师，我们上不了火车。」
「你们在胡说些什么，韦斯莱？」
「哈利张口结舌」

"Mr. Potter, I understand that you may be feeling overwhelmed, but it is important to remember that we are in the midst of a crisis. Your presence and assistance are required. Now, please gather yourself and carry on with your duties."
「我们去拿东西。」
「你在说什么，韦斯莱？」
「屋里只剩下哈利和罗恩和麦格教授。」

「Potter, Weasley, I must commend you on your bravery and resourcefulness in facing the challenges that have befallen Hogwarts. Your actions have not gone unnoticed. However, I must remind you that there are still matters to attend to. The safety and well-being of our students remain our utmost priority. I trust you will assist me in ensuring that all students are accounted for and safely returned to their dormitories.」
「老师，我想看看我妹妹的分院仪式——」
「韦斯莱先生，我理解您对妹妹的关心，但分院仪式是仅限于新生和教职员工的活动。作为学生，您应该尊重学校的规定和程序。」
「老师，我们坐上汽车的时候还没有开学，所以——所以不应该给格兰芬多扣分，对不对?」
「Potter, you were seen by numerous Muggles flying in a magical car! Do you honestly think that's an acceptable excuse?」
「刚踏进阴凉的门厅，就听一个声音响起。」
「这是什么声音？」
「我们要做什么，老师?」
「你们将会参加舞会，Weasley先生。你需要找到一个舞伴，并穿上正式的晚礼服。」
「啊，不要，我也去擦奖品行吗?」
「绝对不行。洛哈特教授特别要求你去。八点准时，你们俩。」
「我的意见是，校长，波特没有完全说实话。我们或许应该取消他的一些特权，直到他把事情原原本本地告诉我们。我个人认为，最好让他离开格兰芬多魁地奇队，等态度老实了再说。」

「Severus, I understand your concerns, but we must remember that Harry has faced immense challenges and has proven himself time and again. It is not for us to strip him of his privileges or remove him from the Gryffindor Quidditch team without proper evidence or due process. Let us not jump to conclusions and instead encourage open communication and trust.」
「又是一起攻击事件，麦格在楼梯上发现了他。」
「There was a bunch of grapes next to him, we think he was trying to sneak up here to visit Potter.」
「被石化了?」
「Yes, I'm afraid so.」
「倾身向前，从科林僵硬的手指间取出照相机」
「What is this contraption, Mr. Creevey?」
「It's a camera, Professor McGonagall! I wanted to capture the moment!」
「A camera? In the midst of such chaos? Mr. Creevey, I must insist that you put that away immediately. This is not the time nor the place for such distractions.」
「和麦格教授留在走廊里」
"Potter, I understand your frustration, but causing a scene in the corridor is not the solution. We must find a way to navigate through this difficult situation with caution and intelligence."
"But Professor, it's not fair! Umbridge is targeting me unfairly!"

"I am well aware of the injustice you are facing, Potter. However, we must exercise restraint and find alternative ways to address this issue. Losing your temper will only play into Umbridge's hands."
"But what can I do? She's making my life miserable!"

"I sympathize with your predicament, but we must be strategic. Seek support from your friends, gather evidence, and find allies who can help expose Umbridge's true nature. Remember, sometimes the greatest battles are won through patience and perseverance."
"I'll try, Professor. It's just so frustrating."

"I understand, Potter. But remember, you are not alone in this fight. We are here to support you, and together, we will find a way to overcome these challenges. Now, let us proceed to our respective destinations and continue our efforts to bring justice to Hogwarts."
「教授，我发誓我没有——」
「你的誓言并不重要，波特。我相信你是无辜的。但现在不是解释的时候。我们必须先找到证据来证明你的清白。」
「哈利和麦格教授走到一个巨大的石头怪兽面前。」
「Potter, what on earth are you doing?」
「I have to get past that monster and find the Philosopher's Stone before Quirrell does!」
「Potter, you mustn't! It's too dangerous!」
「I have to try, Professor. It's the only way to stop Voldemort.」
「Very well, but be careful, Potter. And remember, help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.」
「心像石头一样沉落下去」

「We cannot afford to waste any more time. We must act swiftly and decisively to rescue the student and put an end to this menace once and for all. Gather your wands, colleagues, and let us proceed to the Chamber of Secrets immediately.」
「好吧，也许你最好也来一下，韦斯莱。」
「Mr. Weasley, I assure you that I am fully capable of handling any situation that may arise. Your assistance is not required.」
「正在低身俯视一个留着长长鬈发的五年级学生」
「Miss Granger, a word, please.」
「摇了摇头，他们都死死地盯着赫敏」
「Enough!」
「发生了一件事情，使他们把密室的事忘到了脑后」
「What happened? Why have they forgotten about the Chamber of Secrets?」
「纳威·隆巴顿的魔杖从手里滑落，使课桌的一条腿突然消失了」
「Mr. Longbottom!」
「Sorry, Professor!」
「Ten points from Gryffindor!」
「认真复习!城堡里已经是这种状况了，居然还要考试。」

「Mr. Potter, I understand your concerns, but examinations are a necessary part of education. They serve as a measure of your progress and knowledge. It is important to take them seriously and prepare accordingly. Now, if you have any specific questions or need guidance in your revision, feel free to ask.」
「你能想象我用这个破玩艺儿考试吗?」

「Weasley, I can assure you that the practicality of an object does not determine its effectiveness in an examination. It is your knowledge and skill that will be tested, not the appearance of the instrument. Now, please focus and follow the instructions accordingly.」
「魁地奇比赛恢复了!」
「Indeed? That is most welcome news, Mr. Wood. I trust the teams are prepared and ready to give their best performance on the pitch?」
